Package HWSystem.Devices

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bluetooth
    Represents a Bluetooth wireless communication device.
    BME280
    Represents a BME280 temperature sensor.
    Device
    Represents a generic device in the system.
    DHT11
    Represents a DHT11 temperature and humidity sensor.
    Display
    Abstract class representing a display device.
    GY951
    Represents the GY-951 IMU sensor.
    IMUSensor
    Represents an Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) sensor.
    LCD
    Represents an LCD display device that operates using the I2C protocol.
    MotorDriver
    Represents an abstract motor driver device.
    MPU6050
    Represents the MPU6050 IMU sensor that operates using the I2C protocol.
    OLED
    Represents an OLED display device that operates using the SPI protocol.
    PCA9685
    Represents the PCA9685 motor driver that operates using the I2C protocol.
    Sensor
    Represents a general sensor device.
    SparkFunMD
    Represents the SparkFunMD motor driver that operates using the SPI protocol.
    TempSensor
    Abstract class representing a temperature sensor.
    Wifi
    Represents a WiFi device that operates using SPI or UART protocols.
    WirelessIO
    Represents a device capable of wireless communication.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    State
    Enum representing the possible states of a device: ON or OFF.
